RandomCoverage.cpp
Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /**
00002  * \file RandomCoverage.cpp
00003  * \brief Coverage test for %RandomLib
00004  *
00005  * Compile/link with, e.g.,\n
00006  * g++ -I../include -O2 -funroll-loops
00007  *   -o RandomCoverage RandomCoverage.cpp ../src/Random.cpp\n
00008  * ./RandomCoverage
00009  *
00010  * This executes nearly all of the public functions in %RandomLib.  This is
00011  * important, since it allows the compiler to check the code which appears in
00012  * header files.  It also shows how templated functions can be invoked.
00013  *
00014  * $Id: d7447c8c9999b14028b8e0fd30a62f30bd193927 $
00015  *
00016  * Copyright (c) Charles Karney (2006-2011) <charles@karney.com> and licensed
00017  * under the MIT/X11 License.  For more information, see
00018  * http://randomlib.sourceforge.net/
00019  **********************************************************************/
00020 
00021 #include <iostream>
00022 #include <vector>
00023 #include <string>
00024 #include <sstream>
00025 #include <RandomLib/Random.hpp>
00026 #include <RandomLib/NormalDistribution.hpp>
00027 #include <RandomLib/ExponentialDistribution.hpp>
00028 #include <RandomLib/RandomSelect.hpp>
00029 #include <RandomLib/LeadingZeros.hpp>
00030 #include <RandomLib/ExponentialProb.hpp>
00031 #include <RandomLib/RandomNumber.hpp>
00032 #include <RandomLib/ExactExponential.hpp>
00033 #include <RandomLib/ExactNormal.hpp>
00034 #include <RandomLib/ExactPower.hpp>
00035 
00036 #define repeat for (int i = 0; i < 1000; ++i)
00037 
00038 void coverage32() {
00039   typedef RandomLib::SRandom32 Random;
00040   {
00041     // Setting and examing the seed + seed management
00042     std::vector<unsigned long> v(Random::SeedVector());
00043     unsigned long w = Random::SeedWord();
00044     std::string s(Random::VectorToString(v));
00045     { Random r(v); }
00046     { Random r(v.begin(), v.end()); }
00047     int a[] = {1, 2, 3, 4};
00048     { Random r(a, a + 4); }
00049     { Random r(w); }
00050     { Random r(s); }
00051     { Random r; }
00052     Random r(0);
00053     r.Reseed(v);
00054     r.Reseed(v.begin(), v.end());
00055     r.Reseed(w);
00056     r.Reseed(s);
00057     r.Reseed();
00058     v = r.Seed();
00059     s = r.SeedString();
00060     r.Reseed(Random::VectorToString(v));
00061     r.Reseed(Random::StringToVector(s));
00062   }
00063   Random r;
00064   {
00065     // Functions returning random integers
00066     repeat r();
00067     repeat r.Ran();
00068     repeat r.Ran32();
00069     repeat r.Ran64();
00070     repeat r(52);
00071     repeat r.Integer<signed short, 3>();
00072     repeat r.Integer<3>();
00073     repeat r.Integer();
00074     repeat r.Integer<signed short>();
00075     repeat r.Integer<signed short>(52);
00076     repeat r.IntegerC<signed short>(51);
00077     repeat r.IntegerC<signed short>(1,52);
00078     repeat r.Integer(6u);
00079     repeat r.IntegerC(5u);
00080     repeat r.IntegerC(1u,6u);
00081     repeat r();
00082     repeat r(52u);
00083   }
00084   {
00085     // Functions returning random reals
00086     repeat { r.Fixed <float,  16 >(); r.Fixed <float>(); r.Fixed (); }
00087     repeat { r.FixedU<float,  16 >(); r.FixedU<float>(); r.FixedU(); }
00088     repeat { r.FixedN<float,  16 >(); r.FixedN<float>(); r.FixedN(); }
00089     repeat { r.FixedW<float,  16 >(); r.FixedW<float>(); r.FixedW(); }
00090     repeat { r.FixedS<float,  16 >(); r.FixedS<float>(); r.FixedS(); }
00091     repeat { r.FixedO<float,  16 >(); r.FixedO<float>(); r.FixedO(); }
00092     repeat { r.Float <float, 4, 2>(); r.Float <float>(); r.Float (); }
00093     repeat { r.FloatU<float, 4, 2>(); r.FloatU<float>(); r.FloatU(); }
00094     repeat { r.FloatN<float, 4, 2>(); r.FloatN<float>(); r.FloatN(); }
00095     repeat { r.FloatW<float, 4, 2>(); r.FloatW<float>(); r.FloatW(); }
00096     repeat { r.Real<float>(); r.Real(); }
00097   }
00098   {
00099     // Functions returning other random results
00100     repeat r.Boolean();
00101     repeat r.Prob(0.5f);
00102     repeat r.Prob(2.3, 7.0);
00103     repeat r.Prob(23, 70);
00104     repeat r.Bits< 5>();
00105     repeat r.Bits<64>();
00106   }
00107   {
00108     // Normal distribution
00109     RandomLib::NormalDistribution<float> nf;
00110     RandomLib::NormalDistribution<> nd;
00111     repeat nf(r);
00112     repeat nd(r, 1.0, 2.0);
00113   }
00114   {
00115     // Exponention distribution
00116     RandomLib::ExponentialDistribution<float> ef;
00117     RandomLib::ExponentialDistribution<> ed;
00118     repeat ef(r);
00119     repeat ed(r, 2.0);
00120   }
00121   {
00122     // Discrete probabilities
00123     unsigned w[] = { 0, 0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 5, 4, 3, 2, 1 };
00124     std::vector<int> wi(13);
00125     std::vector<float> wf(13);
00126     for (int i = 0; i < 13; ++i) {
00127       wi[i] = int(w[i]);
00128       wf[i] = float(w[i]);
00129     }
00130     { RandomLib::RandomSelect<unsigned> sel; }
00131     { RandomLib::RandomSelect<unsigned> sel(w, w + 13); }
00132     { RandomLib::RandomSelect<unsigned> sel(wi.begin(), wi.end()); }
00133     { RandomLib::RandomSelect<unsigned> sel(wi); }
00134     { RandomLib::RandomSelect<> sel; }
00135     { RandomLib::RandomSelect<> sel(w, w + 13); }
00136     { RandomLib::RandomSelect<> sel(wi); }
00137     { RandomLib::RandomSelect<> sel(wf.begin(), wf.end()); }
00138     { RandomLib::RandomSelect<> sel(wf); }
00139     {
00140       RandomLib::RandomSelect<unsigned> sel;
00141       sel.Init(w, w + 13);
00142       sel.Init(wi.begin(), wi.end());
00143       sel.Init(wi);
00144       repeat sel(r);
00145       sel.TotalWeight();
00146       sel.MaxWeight();
00147       sel.Weight(3);
00148       sel.Choices();
00149     }
00150     {
00151       RandomLib::RandomSelect<> sel;
00152       sel.Init(w, w + 13);
00153       sel.Init(wi.begin(), wi.end());
00154       sel.Init(wi);
00155       sel.Init(wf);
00156       repeat sel(r);
00157       sel.TotalWeight();
00158       sel.MaxWeight();
00159       sel.Weight(3);
00160       sel.Choices();
00161     }
00162     // Other distributions
00163     { RandomLib::LeadingZeros lz; repeat lz(r); }
00164     { RandomLib::ExponentialProb ep; repeat ep(r, 1.5f); }
00165     {
00166       // Infinite precision random numbers
00167       {
00168         RandomLib::RandomNumber<1> n;
00169         n.Init(2);
00170         n.Digit(r, 10);
00171         n.RawDigit(4);
00172         n.AddInteger(-2);
00173         n.SetInteger(5);
00174         n.Negate();
00175         n.Size();
00176         n.Range();
00177         n.Integer();
00178         n.Fraction<float>(r);
00179         n.Value<double>(r);
00180         RandomLib::RandomNumber<1> p;
00181         n.LessThan(r, p);
00182         std::ostringstream os;
00183         os << n;
00184       }
00185       {
00186         RandomLib::RandomNumber<32> n;
00187         n.Init(2);
00188         n.Digit(r, 10);
00189         n.RawDigit(4);
00190         n.AddInteger(-2);
00191         n.SetInteger(5);
00192         n.Negate();
00193         n.Size();
00194         n.Range();
00195         n.Integer();
00196         n.Fraction<float>(r);
00197         n.Value<double>(r);
00198         RandomLib::RandomNumber<32> p;
00199         n.LessThan(r, p);
00200         std::ostringstream os;
00201         os << n;
00202       }
00203       // Exact distributions
00204       { RandomLib::ExactExponential< 1> ed; repeat ed(r).Value<float >(r); }
00205       { RandomLib::ExactExponential<32> ed; repeat ed(r).Value<double>(r); }
00206       { RandomLib::ExactNormal< 1> ed; repeat ed(r).Value<float >(r); }
00207       { RandomLib::ExactNormal<32> ed; repeat ed(r).Value<double>(r); }
00208       { RandomLib::ExactPower< 1> pd; repeat pd(r,2).Value<float >(r); }
00209       { RandomLib::ExactPower<32> pd; repeat pd(r,3).Value<double>(r); }
00210     }
00211   }
00212   {
00213     // Setting position in sequence
00214     r.Count();
00215     r.StepCount(1000);
00216     r.Reset();
00217     r.SetCount(10000);
00218     r.SetStride(10,1);
00219     r.SetStride(5);
00220     r.GetStride();
00221     r.SetStride();
00222   }
00223   {
00224     // Other
00225     Random s(r);
00226     s = Random::Global;
00227     s == r;
00228     s != s;
00229     r.swap(s);
00230     std::swap(r, s);
00231   }
00232 }
00233 
00234 void coverage64() {
00235   typedef RandomLib::SRandom64 Random;
00236   {
00237     // Setting and examing the seed + seed management
00238     std::vector<unsigned long> v(Random::SeedVector());
00239     unsigned long w = Random::SeedWord();
00240     std::string s(Random::VectorToString(v));
00241     { Random r(v); }
00242     { Random r(v.begin(), v.end()); }
00243     int a[] = {1, 2, 3, 4};
00244     { Random r(a, a + 4); }
00245     { Random r(w); }
00246     { Random r(s); }
00247     { Random r; }
00248     Random r(0);
00249     r.Reseed(v);
00250     r.Reseed(v.begin(), v.end());
00251     r.Reseed(w);
00252     r.Reseed(s);
00253     r.Reseed();
00254     v = r.Seed();
00255     s = r.SeedString();
00256     r.Reseed(Random::VectorToString(v));
00257     r.Reseed(Random::StringToVector(s));
00258   }
00259   Random r;
00260   {
00261     // Functions returning random integers
00262     repeat r();
00263     repeat r.Ran();
00264     repeat r.Ran32();
00265     repeat r.Ran64();
00266     repeat r(52);
00267     repeat r.Integer<signed short, 3>();
00268     repeat r.Integer<3>();
00269     repeat r.Integer();
00270     repeat r.Integer<signed short>();
00271     repeat r.Integer<signed short>(52);
00272     repeat r.IntegerC<signed short>(51);
00273     repeat r.IntegerC<signed short>(1,52);
00274     repeat r.Integer(6u);
00275     repeat r.IntegerC(5u);
00276     repeat r.IntegerC(1u,6u);
00277     repeat r();
00278     repeat r(52u);
00279   }
00280   {
00281     // Functions returning random reals
00282     repeat { r.Fixed <float,  16 >(); r.Fixed <float>(); r.Fixed (); }
00283     repeat { r.FixedU<float,  16 >(); r.FixedU<float>(); r.FixedU(); }
00284     repeat { r.FixedN<float,  16 >(); r.FixedN<float>(); r.FixedN(); }
00285     repeat { r.FixedW<float,  16 >(); r.FixedW<float>(); r.FixedW(); }
00286     repeat { r.FixedS<float,  16 >(); r.FixedS<float>(); r.FixedS(); }
00287     repeat { r.FixedO<float,  16 >(); r.FixedO<float>(); r.FixedO(); }
00288     repeat { r.Float <float, 4, 2>(); r.Float <float>(); r.Float (); }
00289     repeat { r.FloatU<float, 4, 2>(); r.FloatU<float>(); r.FloatU(); }
00290     repeat { r.FloatN<float, 4, 2>(); r.FloatN<float>(); r.FloatN(); }
00291     repeat { r.FloatW<float, 4, 2>(); r.FloatW<float>(); r.FloatW(); }
00292     repeat { r.Real<float>(); r.Real(); }
00293   }
00294   {
00295     // Functions returning other random results
00296     repeat r.Boolean();
00297     repeat r.Prob(0.5f);
00298     repeat r.Prob(2.3, 7.0);
00299     repeat r.Prob(23, 70);
00300     repeat r.Bits< 5>();
00301     repeat r.Bits<64>();
00302   }
00303   {
00304     // Normal distribution
00305     RandomLib::NormalDistribution<float> nf;
00306     RandomLib::NormalDistribution<> nd;
00307     repeat nf(r);
00308     repeat nd(r, 1.0, 2.0);
00309   }
00310   {
00311     // Exponention distribution
00312     RandomLib::ExponentialDistribution<float> ef;
00313     RandomLib::ExponentialDistribution<> ed;
00314     repeat ef(r);
00315     repeat ed(r, 2.0);
00316   }
00317   {
00318     // Discrete probabilities
00319     unsigned w[] = { 0, 0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 5, 4, 3, 2, 1 };
00320     std::vector<int> wi(13);
00321     std::vector<float> wf(13);
00322     for (int i = 0; i < 13; ++i) {
00323       wi[i] = int(w[i]);
00324       wf[i] = float(w[i]);
00325     }
00326     { RandomLib::RandomSelect<unsigned> sel; }
00327     { RandomLib::RandomSelect<unsigned> sel(w, w + 13); }
00328     { RandomLib::RandomSelect<unsigned> sel(wi.begin(), wi.end()); }
00329     { RandomLib::RandomSelect<unsigned> sel(wi); }
00330     { RandomLib::RandomSelect<> sel; }
00331     { RandomLib::RandomSelect<> sel(w, w + 13); }
00332     { RandomLib::RandomSelect<> sel(wi); }
00333     { RandomLib::RandomSelect<> sel(wf.begin(), wf.end()); }
00334     { RandomLib::RandomSelect<> sel(wf); }
00335     {
00336       RandomLib::RandomSelect<unsigned> sel;
00337       sel.Init(w, w + 13);
00338       sel.Init(wi.begin(), wi.end());
00339       sel.Init(wi);
00340       repeat sel(r);
00341       sel.TotalWeight();
00342       sel.MaxWeight();
00343       sel.Weight(3);
00344       sel.Choices();
00345     }
00346     {
00347       RandomLib::RandomSelect<> sel;
00348       sel.Init(w, w + 13);
00349       sel.Init(wi.begin(), wi.end());
00350       sel.Init(wi);
00351       sel.Init(wf);
00352       repeat sel(r);
00353       sel.TotalWeight();
00354       sel.MaxWeight();
00355       sel.Weight(3);
00356       sel.Choices();
00357     }
00358     // Other distributions
00359     { RandomLib::LeadingZeros lz; repeat lz(r); }
00360     { RandomLib::ExponentialProb ep; repeat ep(r, 1.5f); }
00361     {
00362       // Infinite precision random numbers
00363       {
00364         RandomLib::RandomNumber<1> n;
00365         n.Init(2);
00366         n.Digit(r, 10);
00367         n.RawDigit(4);
00368         n.AddInteger(-2);
00369         n.SetInteger(5);
00370         n.Negate();
00371         n.Size();
00372         n.Range();
00373         n.Integer();
00374         n.Fraction<float>(r);
00375         n.Value<double>(r);
00376         RandomLib::RandomNumber<1> p;
00377         n.LessThan(r, p);
00378         std::ostringstream os;
00379         os << n;
00380       }
00381       {
00382         RandomLib::RandomNumber<32> n;
00383         n.Init(2);
00384         n.Digit(r, 10);
00385         n.RawDigit(4);
00386         n.AddInteger(-2);
00387         n.SetInteger(5);
00388         n.Negate();
00389         n.Size();
00390         n.Range();
00391         n.Integer();
00392         n.Fraction<float>(r);
00393         n.Value<double>(r);
00394         RandomLib::RandomNumber<32> p;
00395         n.LessThan(r, p);
00396         std::ostringstream os;
00397         os << n;
00398       }
00399       // Exact distributions
00400       { RandomLib::ExactExponential< 1> ed; repeat ed(r).Value<float >(r); }
00401       { RandomLib::ExactExponential<32> ed; repeat ed(r).Value<double>(r); }
00402       { RandomLib::ExactNormal< 1> ed; repeat ed(r).Value<float >(r); }
00403       { RandomLib::ExactNormal<32> ed; repeat ed(r).Value<double>(r); }
00404       { RandomLib::ExactPower< 1> pd; repeat pd(r,2).Value<float >(r); }
00405       { RandomLib::ExactPower<32> pd; repeat pd(r,3).Value<double>(r); }
00406     }
00407   }
00408   {
00409     // Setting position in sequence
00410     r.Count();
00411     r.StepCount(1000);
00412     r.Reset();
00413     r.SetCount(10000);
00414     r.SetStride(10,1);
00415     r.SetStride(5);
00416     r.GetStride();
00417     r.SetStride();
00418   }
00419   {
00420     // Other
00421     Random s(r);
00422     s = Random::Global;
00423     s == r;
00424     s != s;
00425     r.swap(s);
00426     std::swap(r, s);
00427   }
00428 }
00429 
00430 int main(int, char**) {
00431   std::cout << "RandomLib Coverage Test\n";
00432   coverage32();
00433   coverage64();
00434   int retval = 0;
00435   {
00436     using namespace RandomLib;
00437     {
00438       RandomEngine<MT19937<Random_u32>,MixerMT0<Random_u32> >
00439         s("0x123,0x234,0x345,0x456");
00440       s.SetCount(999);
00441       bool pass = s() == 3460025646U;
00442       std::cout << "Check " << s.Name()
00443                 << (pass ? " passed\n" : " FAILED\n");
00444       if (!pass) retval = 1;
00445     }
00446     {
00447       RandomEngine<MT19937<Random_u64>,MixerMT0<Random_u64> >
00448         s("0x12345,0,0x23456,0,0x34567,0,0x45678,0");
00449       s.SetCount(999);
00450       bool pass = s() == 994412663058993407ULL;
00451       std::cout << "Check " << s.Name()
00452                 << (pass ? " passed\n" : " FAILED\n");
00453       if (!pass) retval = 1;
00454     }
00455     {
00456       SRandomGenerator32 s("0x1234,0x5678,0x9abc,0xdef0");
00457       s.SetCount(999);
00458       bool pass = s() == 788493625U;
00459       std::cout << "Check " << s.Name()
00460                 << (pass ? " passed\n" : " FAILED\n");
00461       if (!pass) retval = 1;
00462     }
00463     {
00464       SRandomGenerator64 s("5,4,3,2,1");
00465       s.SetCount(999);
00466       bool pass = s() == 13356980519185762498ULL;
00467       std::cout << "Check " << s.Name()
00468                 << (pass ? " passed\n" : " FAILED\n");
00469       if (!pass) retval = 1;
00470     }
00471   }
00472   return retval;
00473 }
